sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your village wants to take the <radical>village</radical> <radical>dog</radical> and <radical>boil</radical> it, and you can think of no other response than <kanji>SHUT UP</kanji>!
meaningInfo: The entire village is shouting and yelling and pointing at the poor dog. They're boiling a giant boiling pot of water, and you can't even hear yourself think anymore. Shut up, shut up, shut up!
readingMnemonic: The villagers are mad that you told them to <kanji>shut up</kanji>, and they start to <reading>mock</reading> (<ja>もく</ja>) you. They put their hands on their hips, lean forward, cross their eyes, and yell "SHUT UP!" back.
readingInfo: Even the dog is mocking you now. It's barks sound more like "shut up, shut up" than "bow wow, bow wow." What the heck dog, I was trying to save your life!
